name: Mutate
description: If your Immunity runs out, you will mutate into a feral zombie, entering light will harm you and biting other people will fix it. When mutated: Attack = Slash, Use = Bite. when biting another player, they become infected aswell. their infection can be stopped with medication but progress cannot be tracked as easily.

badges.text: You have 3 minutes of Immunity, it can be refilled by staying in the light, or the sun. If it runs out you will transform into a Feral Infected. Entering a crimson forest will rapidly decrease it
